issue.title: Low frame rates from MultisenseSL cameras in VRC Task1

content.raw:
We were able to reproduce this, it seems like vsync is on by default on some nvidia drivers which impacted the framerate. Turn it off by going to nvidia-settings -> X Screen 0 -> OpenGL Settings, and uncheck Sync to VBlank

Let me know if that works for you
